synopsis: While on guard duty on a ship, and while his friends are planning to heist that same ship, Goemon faces his most terrifying foe yet, the Bermuda Ghost. The modern-day samurai will need to hone all his abilities in order to defeat this adversary.

title.en: Lupin the Third: Goemon Ishikawa's Spray of Blood
title.jp: Lupin the IIIrd: Chikemuri no Ishikawa Goemon
